channel.title: Cortana Intelligence Suite Education
channel.description: From the Microsoft Machine Learning and Data Science Team

item.title: Cortana Intelligence Suite Education - Foundations
item.description:
Here are the resources for each of the modules

Introduction to the Cortana Intelligence Platform and the Team Data Science Process

  • 1 - Process and Platform, Environment Configuration
  • 2 - Data Discovery and Ingestion

Ingesting, processing, and consuming data using Azure Data Factory for Orchestration and Management

  • 3 - Data Preparation
  • 4 - Modeling for Machine Learning and Data Mining
  • 5 - Business Validation and Model Evaluation
  • 6 - Deploying and Accessing the Solution

Recap and Final Project for the class

  • 7 - Workshop recap and additional scenarios

item.title: Building Intelligent Chatbots with the Bot Framework
item.description:
Intelligent chatbots with the Bot Framework class material on GitHub:

  • 1/2-Day Course - understanding bots from the ground-up with the Bot Framework
  • 2-Day Course - Developing and Deploying Intelligent Chatbots

Sample bots prevail across GitHub, but here are a few places to start:

  • Official Bot Framework SDKs and samples
  • Official Bot Framework extra samples
